newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary Oct c/a deficit down to $20mln - c.bank.
newsitem.headline: Hungary Oct c/a deficit down to $20mln - c.bank.

text.p: Hungary's current account deficit was $20 million in October, half the September figure of $40 million, National Bank of Hungary president Gyorgy Suranyi told reporters on Thursday.
Suranyi said Hungary was on target for a 1996 current account deficit of $1.5-1.7 billion.

Suranyi did not give the official January-to-October deficit but, based on last month's data, the October figure results in a Jan-Oct total current account deficit of $1.124 billion, compared to a January-to-September gap of $1.104 billion.
